title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 is displaying obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd' prominently.
OB: The obfuscated classes are highly visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should have less prominence in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Open Type dialog.
2. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd'.
